references.paper_title: DPM-Solver: A fast ODE solver for diffusion probabilistic model sampling in around 10 steps
references.reason: This paper introduces DPM-Solver, a fast ODE solver that has become influential in optimizing update directions and which influences the choice of solver in diffusion sampling.
